blogPost.excerpt: Do what matters most. Daily Four is all about getting the important things done with minimal stress. Reflect on your past achievements whenever you need a dose of perspective.
blogPost.body: Do what matters most. Daily Four is all about getting the important things done with minimal stress. Reflect on your past achievements whenever you need a dose of perspective.
blogPost.title: Daily Four - Do what matters most
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 做最重要的事。每日四点就是要用最小的压力完成重要的事情。每当你需要透视的时候，就反思一下你过去的成就。
做最重要的事。每日四點就是要用最小的壓力完成重要的事情。每當你需要透視的時候，就反思一下你過去的成就。

previous.excerpt: Memo enriches your conversations making it super easy to share links, videos, galleries and loads more. Comment on any word, sentence or paragraph in Memo messages. Send longer-form messages with rich media embedded to anyone using their email address.
previous.title: Memo - Async conversations with your friends, fans, and team

localize.description: 备忘录丰富了您的对话，让您可以轻松分享链接、视频、图库等更多内容。在Memo信息中对任何单词、句子或段落进行评论。使用电子邮件地址向任何人发送内嵌丰富媒体的长篇消息。
localize.tagline: 与您的朋友、粉丝和团队进行异步对话。

localize.description: 備忘錄豐富了您的對話，讓您可以輕鬆分享鏈接、視頻、圖庫等更多內容。在Memo信息中對任何單詞、句子或段落進行評論。使用電子郵件地址向任何人發送內嵌豐富媒體的長篇消息。
localize.tagline: 與您的朋友、粉絲和團隊進行異步對話。

next.excerpt: Connect your SQL database to Clay to insert your query results directly in Google Sheets. Goodbye to hopping between SQL editors, CSV downloads, Excel, and Dashboards. Have your financial models, growth charts, and customer lists always up to date!
next.title: ClaySQL - Run SQL queries directly in Google Sheets

localize.description: 将您的SQL数据库连接到Clay，直接在Google Sheets中插入您的查询结果。告别在SQL编辑器、CSV下载、Excel和Dashboards之间跳来跳去。让你的财务模型、增长图表和客户名单始终保持最新。
localize.tagline: 直接在Google Sheets中运行SQL查询

localize.description: 將您的SQL數據庫連接到Clay，直接在Google Sheets中插入您的查詢結果。告別在SQL編輯器、CSV下載、Excel和Dashboards之間跳來跳去。讓你的財務模型、增長圖表和客戶名單始終保持最新。
localize.tagline: 直接在Google Sheets中運行SQL查詢
